Mold & Asbestos Removal. Home Inspection, Vermiculite Removal, Attic Insulation Removal, Vermiculite Insulation, Vermiculite Analysis, Vermiculite Testing
_______________________________________________________________
Templar Mould and Asbestos Analysis & Removal creates healthier environments in homes and workplaces.
 
It's not an easy job and Templar developed a three-step process to make sure your home or business becomes a healthier and more comfortable place to be.
 
Trained and qualified mould and asbestos inspectors find and determine the extent of any mould and asbestos problems.
 
Air sampling and testing specimens helps to determine the best option for removal.
 
We have different options for removal, depending on what's required. All are safe, clean and done with minimum interruption to your home life or business functions.
 
Why Choose Templar?
 
Experienced - Over a decade of Mould Remediation & Asbestos Abatement.
 
Certified - Templar has earned a wide variety of industry standard certification.
IICRC Certified (Mould Remediation)
IAC2 Certified  (Mould / Asbestos Analysis)
MTCU Certified 253W & 253S (Asbestos  /  Vermiculite Abatement)
		
Guaranteed - Templar's Mould and Asbestos Verification options guarantees that you no longer have mould spores or asbestos in your home or business.
 
Put simply, mould and asbestos poison your indoor environments. You need a clean, safe and effective way of making the places where you live and work healthier and more comfortable.

Asbestos Removal, Lead Removal & Mold Detection & Removal

Green Stream Environmental Inc. is one of the leading Asbestos Removal Contractors in Toronto, GTA and Ontario. Based in Toronto, we specialize in the Inspection and Remediation of Asbestos for a variety of residential, commercial and industrial property issues, both hazardous and non-hazardous.

Certified - We are certified by The Institute of Inspection, Cleaning and Restoration (IICRC) - the only certification recognized by North American adjusters in cases of â€˜mouldâ€™ and â€˜water damageâ€™. Our technicians are accredited and hold the following IICRC designations:

    * WRT - Water Damage Restoration Technician
    * AST â€“ Applied Structural Drying Technician
    * AMRT â€“ Applied Microbial Remediation Technician

Trusted - GreenStream Environmental Inc. is fully licensed and insured, holding $2 million dollars of general liability insurance coverage, $2 million dollars of environmental pollution insurance coverage and WSIB coverage.

Also, to avoid any conflict of interest and provide you with unbiased results, we employ 3rd party testing and remediation consulting firms to verify and confirm all findings.

24/7/365 Emergency Service - Professional remediation contractors, weâ€™re trained to deal with emergencies, able to diagnose the source of the problem, and remediate it quickly and efficiently.

Discrete â€“ Discretion and privacy are guaranteed. We use unmarked vehicles and our technicians do not wear uniforms when visiting your property. Rest assured that your environmental issue will be handled without attracting undue attention.

profile:
We do from the biggest to the smallest job and beat any price.
Although our company is relatively new, our crew brings multiple years of experience to the job site. We currently offer a fully licensed (7 years and counting) 6-person crew for all types of abatement and cleanup jobs throughout the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). As the proverbial new kids on the block, we strive to go above and beyond to secure your confidence and continued business. Our continued growth and success in the field hinges on your satisfaction with the work. Our free consultations, competitive pricing, and 100% satisfaction guarantee ensure you are always well served. 
.
.
No matter where you live, the risks associated with asbestos exposure are very real. If you are involved in the trades, or you work in an industrial setting, you need to be especially aware of your surrounding environment. Construction and demolition crews working in hospitals, schools, manufacturing plants, and even residential homes are potentially at risk anytime old components are being removed including insulation, carpeting, wiring, wallboard, popcorn ceilings, siding, roofing, plaster, and many others.
.
.
Limiting oneâ€™s exposure to mould at home or work is extremely important as peopleâ€™s reactions to this fungus can vary drastically. Some may suffer only a sore throat while others may experience asthma-like symptoms and shortness of breath. Window sills, fabrics, cardboard boxes, basements, and rooms with water taps are all susceptible to excess moisture build-up. Dark spots and a musty odor indicate its presence, but unfortunately mould also thrives in locations you canâ€™t easily see: above the ceiling tiles, inside cupboards and closets, and even behind the wallpaper and walls. Renew Air in Scarborough offers mould remediation for residential and commercial customers across Canada.
.
.
When it comes to dealing with hazardous materials, you should demand a team that can verify the safety of your job site or living space with absolute certainty. We are fully licensed and prepared to answer the call 24/7. We donâ€™t consider the job done until you are completely satisfied. With our competitive pricing, we have been kept very busy throughout the years. Although we specialize in the removal of harmful mould and asbestos, our ultimate goal is to protect your health, property, and bottom line.

If you have concerns, a free consultation with our staff should answer any questions you may have. Schedule a convenient time. Call or email us today.

profile:
Ranked Best of 2020, we are a professional mold / asbestos / viral / lead inspection, disinfection and removal company active within Southern Ontario. 

We are the only company to offer inspectors who are certified both as mold inspectors as well as certified home inspectors, (CaNACHI). With this level of knowledge we can provide you will insights others can't. 

We offer three (3) hour turnaround times during regular business hours for inspections...with this level of customer service it's easy to see why we are the best at what we do.  

 

And we pay special attention to the challenges you face when you are concerned about your families health.
 
Maintaining a healthy indoor environment can easily be done with help from our trained and experienced professionals. The air you and your family breathe may be contaminated with black mold spores and other contaminants and dangerous particles. The only way you will know for sure is to have the air in your home inspected. We will be able to provide you with the solutions you need to insure you are breathing fresh and healthy air. When you work with us, you work with specialists who are seasoned, knowledgeable, and who regularly keep up with learning about the latest trends being made in the industry.
  
Our reconstruction teams are licensed City of Toronto contractors and we are also approved by the Province of Ontarioâ€™s GreenON Funding, something you will not find any other mold removal company has.

Our professional approach includes the following:
 
-Showing up promptly for your appointment, and prepared with the materials and the latest moisture detection and thermography tools we need.
-Respect for your home and personal belongings
-A thorough examination of your potential contamination issue
-Effective solutions based on the particular problem found in your home
-Professionals ready to address all of your questions and concerns
-Use of high-quality testing equipment and gear for accurate results
-Timely service that doesnâ€™t keep you waiting
 
Take the next step and give us a call today. We thank you for your interest in our services, and we look forward to hearing from you soon and helping to improve the air that you breathe each and every single day!

profile:
The Concord Group began as a carpet cleaning company in 1983. As our business gained a reputation for quality and customer satisfaction, we began receiving requests for other services. Eventually the volume of requests led us to expand to renovations, interior and exterior decor, painting, electrical, plumbing, and a number of other services.

The Concord Group has become a one-stop-shop for all your home and business needs. We began as a small family organization and although we have grown ten-fold throughout the years, we maintain our dedication to providing a friendly and courteous environment. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

We offer water and flood damage repair, waterproofing, mould removal, carpet cleaning, and home renovations and restoration. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

profile:
LEAP Management Inc. is an environmental consulting company specifically focused on helping residential clients with their environmental needs.  We have a thorough understanding of indoor environments, building structure and potential hazards that can affect your health and housing value.

Are you planning a renovation in the near future?  It is important to sample older building materials such as plaster, drywall, vinyl floor tile, vinyl sheet flooring, ceiling tiles, pipe insulation, duct insulation and vermiculite attic insulation for asbestos content prior to demolition to prevent asbestos fibers from becoming airborne and causing a health hazard.  We can help you safely begin your renovation project.

Are you experiencing allergic symptoms such as itchy, water eyes, sore throat, headaches, cough and runny nose when youâ€™re at home? You may have hidden source of mould growth, which may be affecting your health.  We can help you identify and safely remove mould growth.

Are you thinking of buying an older home, but are worried about potential environmental issues?  We can provide an environmental inspection of your home to identify potential issues that you may encounter (mould, asbestos, lead-based paints, vermiculite, UFFI).

LEAP has only qualified professionals with backgrounds in environmental engineering, microbiology and mycology, experienced in environmental consulting to assess your environmental problems and to provide you with practical environmental solutions in a language you understand.
